name: cvsclm

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(c0, cclm))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, ccvs))
-| wi(wcel(c0, ccvs), wcel(c0, cclm))
body.pretty:
⊢ (w0 → c0 ∈ CMod)
⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ CVec)
⊣ (c0 ∈ CVec → c0 ∈ CMod)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(c0, cclm))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, ccvs))
-| wi(wcel(c0, ccvs), wcel(c0, cclm))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (w0 → c0 ∈ CMod)
⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ CVec)
⊣ (c0 ∈ CVec → c0 ∈ CMod)

stmt.origin: simplbi(wcel(c0, ccvs), wcel(c0, cclm), wcel(c0, clvec))
stmt.pretty: simplbi(c0 ∈ CVec, c0 ∈ CMod, c0 ∈ LVec)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, ccvs), wcel(c0, cclm))
-| wb(wcel(c0, ccvs), wa(wcel(c0, cclm), wcel(c0, clvec)))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ CVec → c0 ∈ CMod)
⊣ (c0 ∈ CVec ↔(c0 ∈ CMod ∧ c0 ∈ LVec))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(c0, cclm))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, ccvs))
-| wb(wcel(c0, ccvs), wa(wcel(c0, cclm), wcel(c0, clvec)))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (w0 → c0 ∈ CMod)
⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ CVec)
⊣ (c0 ∈ CVec ↔(c0 ∈ CMod ∧ c0 ∈ LVec))

body.origin:
|- wb(wcel(c0, ccvs), wa(wcel(c0, cclm), wcel(c0, clvec)))
-| wceq(ccvs, cin(cclm, clvec))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ CVec ↔(c0 ∈ CMod ∧ c0 ∈ LVec))
⊣ CVec =(CMod ⋂ LVec)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(c0, cclm))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, ccvs))
-| wceq(ccvs, cin(cclm, clvec))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (w0 → c0 ∈ CMod)
⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ CVec)
⊣ CVec =(CMod ⋂ LVec)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(c0, cclm))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, ccvs))

comment: A subcomplex vector space is a subcomplex module. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 22-May-2019.)
